S.FORM: Dennis Boyd nilecuhan i Portsmouth, Virginia, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dennis Boyd i 1977 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 4 ku uwac atu silsil 72, namapili' tu nu New Orleans Jazz putiput. 5 a bulad 21 a demiad, 1954 a mihca, Dennis Boyd, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
